comments.body:
CreateTests had been written in a way (this wasn't me actually), that they are modifying parts of ObjectMeta (and they are assuming that it's empty). We can fix this, but I don't think we should do it in this PR.
To explain why this changed, before what we were passing to TestCreate was an object without ObjectMeta, not when I changed it to validController() we need to clear the ObjectMeta, because it contains them.
I assume that we plan to do the same for Create, Delete and other operations as well in future PRs.
Yes (but not too much in a single PR).

diffHunk:

comments.body: Can you also add in the resttest.TestDelete tests as well?
Done, also modified pod/etcd_test to use resttest.TestDelete (which calls into TestNoGraceful). The delete test is somewhat basic, though.
